document.full_text: tenant-protection laws have frustrated many small-time landlords to the point that they have simply taken properties off the market. now one of 12 housing units in san francisco sits vacant.
document.title: the small-time landlord versus tenant protection
lines_and_colors: tenant-protection laws have frustrated many small-time landlords to the point that they have simply taken properties off the market. now one of 12 housing units in san francisco sits vacant.
